H0.text: Alkyl group is the general name for a group of atoms derived from an alkane.

H1.text: Anode group is the general name for a group of atoms derived from an alkane.

H2.text: Oxidation group is the general name for a group of atoms derived from an alkane.

H3.text: Acid group is the general name for a group of atoms derived from an alkane.

A4.text: In organic chemistry, an alkyl group is an alkane missing one hydrogen.
